About Me

I enjoy intertwining my creativity with complex problem solving, whether it's coding, computer building, graphic design, 3D printing, laser engraving, welding or web development. My passion stems from an unrelenting desire to learn more, and the hope that I can change the world for the better.

Just your average spanish speaking, skydiving, space exploration promoting, child right activisting, ted talk watching, world traveling, soccer playing, movie enthusiast, helluva engineer.
